title: Increased frequency of lag spikes recently
body:
I have noticed that in nearly every game i have played for the past week or so has had people dc/ lag spike randomly multiple times throughout a game, this will happen when everything else is running fine, skype, music etc and to no real fault of the person (they aren't on a potato computer or have potato net), I am at my university which as universities often do has some pretty great internet, and my pc is fine also, and this has been happening to me every second/third game. Now its not as bad as it was when ranked was disabled but it is definitely still present. Was wondering if anyone else picked up on this trend as well or not.
and the whole submit a ticket process really hasn't been helpful for me, as even when the ranked que was disabled at that stage all i got was a typical copy paste answer which of course yielded no results other than the normal 'its probably your internet' (it isn't).
So yeah, anyone else affected?

replies.body: I think you shouldn't play when you have bad internet or know when it's likely gonna happen, and you seem to be doing pretty well in your matches. I've had this happened to me in the past where I kept disconnecting and lagging to be blamed for leaving or afk, which had stopped my enjoyment of playing league. Hopefully you won't have that issue anymore once you get a better connection or a gaming laptop like I did. Which university do you go to? :)
But as i said, its not my internet. I go to the University of Newcastle, living on campus.
